trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana needs you to borrow a griffin's wings.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Giff.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_TODO_01<tab>Use the griffin's Buffet ability on frenzied swarms.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_TODO_02<tab>Report to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_000<tab>Ah, jussst the ssstrider I wanted to sssee. We have sssoldiers out on a joint training exercise, and they've sssent a requessst for aid.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_001<tab>As matters ssstand, you'll be needing a griffin to render the necessary assistance. Giff will explain the sssituation.

TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_000_010<tab>Here to lend a hand, are you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>? I don't know what Eshana's told you, but it seems our fighters are being swarmed by tiny flying vilekin. Actual <var 1A 02 /var>swarms<var 1A 01 /var> of them.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_000_011<tab>I don't know what our folk did to annoy them, but once those pests get riled up, there's no shooing them away.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_000_012<tab>My plan is for you to fly a griffin over to Virdjala, and have it disperse those biting buggers with a good buffet from its wings.

TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_000_013<tab>Once you're done, you can hop off wherever you please─the griffin's trained to return to me after the rider dismounts. Might be easiest if you report directly to Eshana, of course.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA_000_020<tab>Hells-spawned fiends! There's a dozen more for every one I swat!
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>A swarm of vilekin is attacking this soldier. Speak with Giff in Castellum Velodyna and borrow a griffin for its Buffet ability.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ANANTASOLDIERA_000_022<tab>I've ssslapped and ssswiped a hundred times but they won't leave him be!
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA_000_023<tab>Oof! Why did you─ Oh, they're gone! Thank Rhalgr!
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ANANTASOLDIERA_000_024<tab>...And thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. If you hadn't come, my comrade here would have been bitten and stung to death.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA_000_025<tab>Aye, not exactly the kind of training I signed up for. We'd best find a new place to spar.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERB_000_026<tab>Godsdamn these winged demons! Get away from me!
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ANANTASOLDIERB_000_027<tab>Go on! Shoo! ...Ugh, it'sss hopeless!
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERB_000_028<tab>Phew... Thank you so much. I thought those little bastards would eat me alive...
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ANANTASOLDIERB_000_029<tab>Those pesssts ignored me and flew ssstraight at him. Curious. We'll head back for now, and have this ssstrider's wounds ssseen to.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_100_029<tab>Lost your griffin, did you? Here, try to stay in the saddle this time.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_030<tab>Was Giff's plan a sssuccess?
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_031<tab>That is a relief. Being blasssted by a griffin's wings was likely unpleasant, but better that than sssuffer a ssslow death from a ssswarm.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_032<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_033<tab>I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem. It is a wonder that you did not fall victim to the sssame fate.
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_034<tab>I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem.

TEXT_BANANA406_03055_ESHANA_000_035<tab>Ssspeaking of which, Giff is apparently terrified of those insssects. He mussst have been glad indeed that you arrived to perform the ressscue in his ssstead...
TEXT_BANANA406_03055_GIFF_100_045<tab>You've blown away those little buggers then, have you? Head over to Eshana and tell her the good news.
